name: NEXUS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
description:
Nexus Technologies Inc. was incorporated in December 1994 with a vision to create a professionally run company that delivers real business benefits to its clients through leading technologies. Today, Nexus is proud to be a prominent force in the Philippine IT industry, having carved a niche as the systems integrator and corporate IT reseller of choice of some of the Philippines' top corporations. It has successfully forged long-term client partnerships anchored by a keen understanding that technology plays a pivotal role in the delivery and the achievement of an organization's business goals.
 
Nexus is ably steered by the reputable industry experience and histories of its founders, Juan Chua, Alfonso Olondriz, and Mario Arroyo. The Nexus leadership makes it a fundamental practice to hire the best people in the industry and takes under its wings new blood with potential. As a result, the 200-strong company maintains a vibrant culture that is always open to new ideas and believes in the ability of its people to help move the business.
Flexibility and openness to change are among the strongest qualities of Nexus as a company. These are reflected on the various aspects of its business- from the management and the people, to the choice of solutions and quality of customer support.
 
Nexus maintains a strong network of IT solutions providers culled carefully from a genuine passion to provide solutions that offer genuine business advantage. The company has never been afraid to actively push new products. A local pioneer in solutions-based reselling, Nexus carried Hewlett-Packard and Microsoft back when they were new players in the server market. It approaches the business today with the same bravado.
Veering away from products that have been too commodified, Nexus constantly strives for the most effective mix of value and pricing in its broad range of offerings.
 
Beyond the sale, the company makes sure to stay with its customers through to implementation, ensuring service and support that enable customers to get the most returns from their investments.
 
Nexus maintains its focus as a corporate IT reseller and systems integrator while diversifying its IT services and product offerings. To further boost its value as a company to its partners-clients, principals, and stakeholders-Nexus started venturing into IT companies with different core businesses.

name: Puritas
description:
Founded in 2006, Puritas has grown becoming a leading provider of fund administration, fund management and client data management solutions, supplying award winning, high quality and functionally complex software applications to the financial services industry.

Our systems allow organisations to fully resolve the historic challenges and problems they face in their complex operational and regulatory environments by delivering first class customer service efficiently whilst meeting regulatory demands.

We continue to focus on innovation and development and with a strong team containing a wealth of expertise we deliver quality feature rich technology that solves problems and enables opportunities.

Our Products

PureFunds
Our share dealing software is designed to simplify and streamline your fund administration processes. As a comprehensive product, PureFunds helps you control daily, weekly and monthly dealing activities, so you can keep track of all funds under administration.

You’ll be able to efficiently process subscriptions, redemptions, distributions, switches, conversion and transfers – all the while keeping your investor register up to date. You can easily manage NAV updates and FX rates, as well as the distribution of investor correspondence through the integrated banking or swift interfaces.

As an automated application, you’ll stay on top of your admin and stay ahead of the competition as you deliver an exceptional service to your clients.

PureClient
Our customer data management software lets you manage complex customer data and stay compliant with all regulations. As a fully-integrated platform, it enables you to view and extract data via reports, so you can easily manage data changes. It incorporates all CDD, risk controls and assessments into one standardised system, freeing up your time and resources.

It provides a ‘single source of truth’ system that gives you a 360-degree view of your clients and their entity relationships.

With its advanced reporting capabilities, you can generate reports that will satisfy corporate needs, client expectations and all regulatory requirements.

Die Kutzschbach Electronic GmbH & Co. KG hat sich über die letzten 35 Jahre als national und international erfolgreiches Unternehmen auf die Kernbereiche IT, Softwareentwicklung und Automatisierung spezialisiert. Im 60-köpfige Team setzen wir uns hohe Qualitätsmaßstäbe. 

Unser Portfolio ist umfangreich und vielseitig. Ob klassische On-Premis-IT, beständige Consulting-Lösungen oder moderne Cloudservices. Unser Anspruch ist: "intelligente Konzepte, moderne Lösungen, beständige Qualität, sowie Neugierde und Begeisterung für das Neue". 

Die Teams der Kutzschbach Electronic GmbH & Co. KG und der Kutzschbach INNOVATIONS GmbH in Augsburg arbeiten Hand in Hand. 
Zwei Unternehmen - EIN Team

name: Tollring
description:
Micro Plus Software, t/a Tollring Ltd  is a global leader in cloud communications analytics, data visualization, and business intelligence tools.  

With offices in the UK, USA, India, and Australia, Tollring serves over 20,000 businesses worldwide through an extensive channel partner network. 

Specializing in customer experience analytics, call recording, and business intelligence, Tollring provides cutting-edge solutions that help businesses streamline communications and accelerate growth. 

As a Microsoft Partner, certified in ISO 9001 and ISO/IEC 27001, and winner of the “Best Call Management Solution” at the Comms National Awards 2024, Tollring combines innovation with security and quality, earning the trust of organizations around the world.  

All three core solutions of Analytics 365 developed by Tollring — Call Analytics, Call Recording with Conversational Intelligence, and Collaboration Analytics — have achieved Microsoft Azure IP Co-Sell Eligibility status. 
 
Tollring for Service Providers:  

Tollring has worked with partners for over 30 years, demonstrating a deep understanding of the challenges of customer acquisition and retention.  Our solutions help you differentiate, increase ARPU and reduce churn by adding valuable services to your portfolio.

name: Fermorite
description:
Fermorite is private company based in Greece, specializing in cutting edge technology service offerings, including the following main areas:

1) ISV services through smart building application software development utilizing latest IoT and AI technologies.
2) Systems integration consulting services.
3) Cloud and managed hosting services based on the Microsoft and Citrix Cloud platforms.

The main focus of our systems integration, cloud and managed hosting projects is to become a trusted advisor and implementer of cloud solutions and an established partner in the Microsoft and Citrix ecosystems. By utilizing state of the art methodologies, best practices and toolsets, Fermorite aspires to constantly combine the latest technological advances with the customers business requirements into robust and future-proof cloud-based solutions. 

Fermorite Microsoft Cloud consulting services are offered via the Azure marketplace (https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/consulting-services/fermorite1606902382378.fermorite_azure_app_migration) and the AppSource marketplace (https://appsource.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/consulting-services/fermorite1606902382378.fermorite_microsoft_365_migration).

The main focus of our IoT projects is to integrate modern Artificial Intelligence techniques into existing buildings fabric so as to enhance safety, security, comfort and energy savings in the built environment for its occupants being elderly people, families or even company buildings. We envision a platform that by means of unobtrusive, user-friendly technological solutions and based on either real-time or historically extracted and profiled data will provide a suite of user-oriented services such as monitoring, analysis and guidance so as to enhance safety, security, comfort and energy savings and in general enhance the quality of life. 

Fermorite brings together a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals, each contributing as subject matter expert in their areas of expertise.

name: PC SOLUTIONS PVT. LIMITED
description:
PC Solutions is a trusted name in IT services and solutions, with over 30 years of experience in delivering innovation-led technology transformation. We began as a reliable OEM hardware and software provider and have evolved into a full-spectrum Managed Services and Digital Transformation Partner, helping businesses across industries modernize, secure, and scale their IT environments.

We specialize in Hybrid and Multi-Cloud Services, Modern Workplace Solutions, Cybersecurity, and Application Development & Integration, delivering measurable outcomes through customized service delivery frameworks. Our team of certified professionals leverages industry-best practices to offer seamless integration, proactive management, and 24x7 support for mission-critical systems.

As a Microsoft Tier-1 Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) and strategic partner to leading global technology vendors, we are uniquely positioned to help clients at every stage of their digital journey—whether it’s cloud migration, infrastructure optimization, or automating business processes for greater agility and resilience.

At PC Solutions, we understand that every business is unique. That’s why we align our services with your goals, ensuring operational efficiency, business continuity, and a secure digital ecosystem. Our customer-first approach, combined with strong governance and service excellence, has helped us build long-term relationships with some of the most respected brands in India and beyond.

From building and managing on-premises and cloud infrastructure to delivering secure remote work environments and future-ready business applications, PC Solutions is your trusted technology partner—empowering your business to thrive in an ever-evolving digital world.

name: Rimrock Corporation
description:
We are a Microsoft Dynamics Gold Certified ERP and Silver Certified CRM Partner specializing in integrated software solutions. For over 20 years, we have delivered customized ERP and CRM software solutions with expertise in Microsoft Dynamics GP and Microsoft Dynamics CRM. 

We have also recently developed two new products, FIELDBOSS and Elevator 365, tailored towards specific industries. For service providers, FIELDBOSS is an end-to-end field service solution within Dynamics. Elevator 365 monitors and tracks elevator maintenance for property managers. For more information, visit www.fieldboss.com and www.elevator365software.com.

Our goal is to help our clients connect with their employees, customers, suppliers, and stakeholders. We have helped dozens of businesses, big and small, streamline their operations and increase their capacity for growth. Our team of Dynamics specialists is known for providing highly effective and timely customer support with years of hands-on experience across multiple industries and sectors. Our services consistently rank highest for customer satisfaction, as measured by Microsoft.

Our headquarters is in mid-town Toronto. We have an additional office in New York City and clients all over North America.

description:

name: Axians Infoma GmbH
description:
Die Axians Infoma GmbH ist erfahrener Partner von Kommunen und ihren Betrieben, Rechenzentren sowie kirchlichen Institutionen. Den Kunden ermöglicht das nachhaltige, wirtschaftliche und moderne Produkt- und Dienstleistungsangebot die Bewältigung aktueller und künftiger Herausforderungen. Mit der modular aufgebauten Software Infoma newsystem steht dafür eine einzigartige integrierte Komplettlösung für das Finanzwesen zur Verfügung, ergänzt um Fachverfahren sowie Lösungen rund um das Thema eGovernment. Für den Weg zur Digitalisierung von Verwaltungsprozessen übernimmt Axians Infoma auch die konzeptionelle Beratung und begleitet die Kunden bei der Realisierung.

Insgesamt setzen über 1.300 bundesdeutsche Verwaltungen jeder Größenordnung Infoma newsystem-Produkte ein, davon über 1000 das Finanzwesen Infoma newsystem. Im Bereich Liegenschafts- und Gebäudemanagement stehen rund 400 Kunden auf der Kundenliste. Damit zählt Axians Infoma im Finanzwesen wie im kommunalen Liegenschafts- und Gebäudemanagement zu den Marktführern.

Axians Infoma GmbH is the experienced partner of local governments and their authorities, data centres and church organizations. This sustainable, economic and modern product and service offer provides the customers with the possibility of successfully coping with current and future challenges. With the modular software, Infoma newsystem is a uniquely integrated complete solution for financial accounting, supplemented by specialized methods and solutions surrounding the theme of eGovernment. Axians Infoma is also paving the way for the digitization of administrative processes by providing conceptional advice and supporting customers in implementation.

All in all, more than 1,300 federal German local authorities of all sizes use Infoma newsystem products, and of these authorities, more than 1000 deploy the Infoma newsystem financial system. There are about 400 customers on the customer list in the facilities management sector. As such, Axians Infoma is a market leader in the financial accounting and municipal facility management sector.

name: babble cloud limited
description:
We are Babble.

Technology partners to ambitious businesses.

We have more than a decade of experience and expertise as a Microsoft Solutions Partner for Azure and Modern Work.

We make things as simple as possible, modernising your tech using cloud-based solutions, so you can focus on your goals.

Our solutions harness the power of the cloud, giving you easy to use tools to create a market leading work environment that's agile, scalable and secure.

Working with you to plan and deliver a cost-effective IT solution, Babble can support you on your short - and long-term business strategy. We like to think of ourselves as an extension of your own IT department, an extra pair of hands, adding support when you need it most. Knowing you have an IT department who will act on your behalf gives you the peace of mind that should anything go wrong, we will fix it. What’s more you will also benefit from our unrivalled proactive Account Management ensuring your IT becomes a strategic asset and not a liability.

Founded in 2001, the company works with over 20,000 organisations in a wide range of sectors - including financial, health and education, travel and accommodation, and public services – by sourcing, deploying and supporting locally the very best cloud solutions.

name: Compello AS
description:
Compello Gruppen har som målsetning å bli en ledende aktør i Europa innenfor områdene EDI, eFaktura og fakturagodkjenning. Hver eneste dag etterstreber vi om å tilrettelegge for at organisasjoner spiller bra sammen. Dette gjør vi ved å håndtere fakturaer, transaksjoner og andre bilag på en trygg, rask og sikker måte. Nettopp derfor er vår visjon – We make organizations play well together!

Compello Gruppen utgjør mer enn 90 ansatte fordelt i Oslo, Larvik, Stockholm og München. Vi etterlever våre verdier om å være til å stole på, modige, lagspillere og lekne. Hovedkontoret ligger på Fornebu utenfor Oslo hvor store deler av våre utviklere, økonomer, selgere, konsulenter, markedsførere, ledere og support-konsulenter er lokalisert.

Våre kollegaer, samarbeidspartnere og kunder er drivkraften i vår virksomhet. Sammen med våre partnere har Compello Gruppen mer enn 7000 kunder i 20 land. Dette utgjør mer enn 100.000 personer som bruker Compello-løsninger hver eneste dag.

Som et internasjonalt selskap er Compello opptatt av å være en god samfunnsaktør og arbeidsgiver. Vi har derfor inngått noen strategiske samarbeid for å bidra til et samfunn for innovasjon, mangfold og et bedre miljø. Compello driver konkrete tiltak for å øke kvinneandelen og har per i dag en av IT-bransjens høyeste kvinneandel på 40%.

name: abacus edv-lösungen GmbH & Co. KG
description:
Als ausgezeichneter Sage-Partner entwickeln wir seit 1992 zertifizierte Branchen- und Softwarelösungen für den Handel, die Produktion und Logistik. Spezifische Lösungen haben wir für Unternehmen der Lebensmittel-, Pharma und Kosmetikbranche entwickelt. Mit unserem eingespielten Team, bestehend aus über 30 Consultants, EntwicklerInnen und Verwaltungskräften, das an den Standorten Wittenburg, Augsburg und Bremen sitzt oder flexibel im Homeoffice arbeitet, stellen wir sicher, dass unsere Kunden stets optimal betreut werden.

 
Wir haben es uns zur Aufgabe gemacht, die individuellsten Anforderungen unserer Kunden zu erfüllen und unser Prinzip ist einfach: wir hören Ihnen zu und knipsen mit Ihnen zusammen alle Lichter in Ihrem Unternehmen an. Nur so können wir auch wirklich sicher sein, dass wir Ihre Prozesse verstanden haben und übersetzen dies in Software.

Dabei nutzen wir in der Umsetzung die Standardsoftware von Sage und klinken unsere jahrelange Erfahrung in Form von unseren abacus-Zusatzmodulen ein – unsere Software hat vor allem eins: Funktionen, die Sie im Mittelstand benötigen. 
 
Damit all das möglich ist, brauchen wir ein ziemlich starkes Team bei abacus. Und das haben wir! – Unsere Mitarbeiter sind unser größtes Potential: hoch qualifiziert und mit umfangreichen Erfahrungen und Ideen aus anspruchsvollen Projekten ausgestattet. Durch kontinuierliche Schulungen und Weiterbildungen stellen wir sicher, dass unsere interne Qualität auf einem ausgezeichneten Niveau bleibt. Davon profitieren vor allem Sie.

Durch permanente Schulungen und Trainings sichern wir die interne Qualität, die von unseren Kunden und Partnern sehr geschätzt wird.

description:
CLOUD
We strive for building a cloud ecosystem enabling customers to mix and match resources between self-hosted, service provider hosted and Microsoft offered cloud platforms. We envision a unified platform, where customers may host resources at any place in a three-tier cloud, based on policies and internal controls while enjoying consistent user experience, performance, reliability and security.

CYBERSECURITY
Cybersecurity is a top priority for organizations delivering critical infrastructure services. Dom-Daniel consults, trains and delivers solutions on perimeter security, internal control and security, cryptography, data and system forensics, and IT and Dev operational security. Dom-Daniel’s consultants have 10+ years in those areas, working for or delivering solutions to top European service providers.

PRODUCTIVITY AND MOBILITY
Dom-Daniel delivers solutions based on Microsoft technology stack and cloud platform that enables customer to be connected wherever they are, communicate through any medium and form and acquire insights to make smart and informed decisions on the go using on-demand analytical solutions. We foresee our customers having secure and on-demand access to enterprise insights, communicating using voice, text and video using every device on any platform.

name: Marqués Professional Services Information Technology, SL
description:
Marqués consultora Partner de Microsoft especializada en Business Applications con más de 30 años de experiencia, ofrecemos soluciones de gestión empresarial y servicios relacionados con los principales productos que Microsoft proporciona para las pymes.

A lo largo de estos años, en Marqués hemos formado un equipo experto y multidisciplinar que permite dar cobertura a las necesidades principales de cualquier compañía y trasladar nuestra experiencia a las soluciones que implementamos en nuestros clientes.

---------

Marqués, as a Microsoft Partner (Business Application designation) with more than 30 years of experience, we offer business management solutions and services related to the main products that Microsoft provides for SMEs.

Throughout these years, at Marqués we have formed an expert and multidisciplinary team that allows us to cover the main needs of any company and transfer our experience to the solutions that we implement for our clients.

name: Puritas
description:
Founded in 2006, Puritas has grown becoming a leading provider of fund administration, fund management and client data management solutions, supplying award winning, high quality and functionally complex software applications to the financial services industry.

Our systems allow organisations to fully resolve the historic challenges and problems they face in their complex operational and regulatory environments by delivering first class customer service efficiently whilst meeting regulatory demands.

We continue to focus on innovation and development and with a strong team containing a wealth of expertise we deliver quality feature rich technology that solves problems and enables opportunities.

Our Products

PureFunds
Our share dealing software is designed to simplify and streamline your fund administration processes. As a comprehensive product, PureFunds helps you control daily, weekly and monthly dealing activities, so you can keep track of all funds under administration.

You’ll be able to efficiently process subscriptions, redemptions, distributions, switches, conversion and transfers – all the while keeping your investor register up to date. You can easily manage NAV updates and FX rates, as well as the distribution of investor correspondence through the integrated banking or swift interfaces.

As an automated application, you’ll stay on top of your admin and stay ahead of the competition as you deliver an exceptional service to your clients.

PureClient
Our customer data management software lets you manage complex customer data and stay compliant with all regulations. As a fully-integrated platform, it enables you to view and extract data via reports, so you can easily manage data changes. It incorporates all CDD, risk controls and assessments into one standardised system, freeing up your time and resources.

It provides a ‘single source of truth’ system that gives you a 360-degree view of your clients and their entity relationships.

With its advanced reporting capabilities, you can generate reports that will satisfy corporate needs, client expectations and all regulatory requirements.

name: Tollring
description:
Micro Plus Software, t/a Tollring Ltd  is a global leader in cloud communications analytics, data visualization, and business intelligence tools.  

With offices in the UK, USA, India, and Australia, Tollring serves over 20,000 businesses worldwide through an extensive channel partner network. 

Specializing in customer experience analytics, call recording, and business intelligence, Tollring provides cutting-edge solutions that help businesses streamline communications and accelerate growth. 

As a Microsoft Partner, certified in ISO 9001 and ISO/IEC 27001, and winner of the “Best Call Management Solution” at the Comms National Awards 2024, Tollring combines innovation with security and quality, earning the trust of organizations around the world.  

All three core solutions of Analytics 365 developed by Tollring — Call Analytics, Call Recording with Conversational Intelligence, and Collaboration Analytics — have achieved Microsoft Azure IP Co-Sell Eligibility status. 
 
Tollring for Service Providers:  

Tollring has worked with partners for over 30 years, demonstrating a deep understanding of the challenges of customer acquisition and retention.  Our solutions help you differentiate, increase ARPU and reduce churn by adding valuable services to your portfolio.

name: SoftwareONE AG
description: SoftwareOne is a global software and cloud solutions provider and a Microsoft partner of 30+ years. It is redefining how companies build, buy and manage everything in the cloud. By helping clients to migrate and modernize their workloads and applications – and in parallel, to navigate and optimize the resulting software and cloud changes – SoftwareOne unlocks the value of technology. The company’s 8,900 people are driven to deliver a portfolio of software brands combined with cloud and technology capabilities in 90 countries. Headquartered in Switzerland, SoftwareOne is listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange under ticker symbol SWON.

name: EPAM Systems
description: EPAM Systems Inc. (EPAM) is a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company. Since 1993, we have used our software engineering expertise to become a leading global provider of digital engineering, cloud and AI-enabled transformation services, as well as a leading business and experience consulting partner for global enterprises and ambitious startups. We address our clients’ transformation challenges by fusing EPAM Continuum’s integrated strategy, experience and technology consulting with our 30+ years of engineering execution to speed our clients’ time to market and  drive greater value from their innovations and digital investments. Learn more at www.epam.com.

name: RED MAPLE TECHNOLOGIES LLC
description:
Red Maple™ is a leading provider of innovative solutions designed to enhance the functionality and usability of Microsoft Dynamics 365. With a history dating back to 2003, Red Maple has been empowering businesses worldwide with its innovative extensions and additions for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations, Business Central, and Customer Engagement platforms.

Trusted by over 500 companies globally, Red Maple's robust portfolio of products is tailored to meet the diverse needs of businesses across various industries. Our solutions are architected to seamlessly integrate with Microsoft Dynamics 365, offering users unparalleled flexibility, agility, and efficiency.

At Red Maple™, we understand the importance of simplifying complex processes and maximizing operational performance. Our suite of solutions is designed to streamline workflows, reduce complexity, and drive tangible results for our clients. Our payment solutions optimize payment processing, including card present, card not present, ACH, e-wallet payments, Level II/III processing, surcharging, PCI 4.0 readiness, and omni token capabilities. Our solutions also enhance financial management capabilities for complex commission structures, rebates, recurring revenue, and revenue recognition.

With a dedicated team of experts and a focus on innovation, Red Maple is poised to continue revolutionizing the Microsoft Dynamics 365 ecosystem. We are driven by delivering solutions that drive measurable value for our clients.

Discover the power of Red Maple and unlock the full potential of your Microsoft Dynamics 365 investment. Contact us today to learn more about our solutions and how we can help elevate your business to new heights.
